subject: Issues with VAM Haptic Pedals Reactor (VAM 3 PCS PER SET) purchased 3 months ago
description_text:
Hello,

I’m reaching out regarding an issue with my Simsonn X Plus pedals and the
VAM 3-piece haptic set that I purchased approximately three months ago
through Amazon.


Unfortunately, the haptics have stopped working entirely. They appear to be
completely unresponsive. I do not use the third haptic motor, and I tested
the ports on the hub using the unused motor, which worked correctly. This
leads me to believe the issue is with the haptic units themselves rather
than the hub.


Additionally, I’ve noticed that the power adapter included with the
3-haptic set fits extremely loosely in the hub. Because of this, it
disconnects very easily, which may have contributed to the failure.


I will attach my Amazon order details below for reference. Please let me
know the next steps for troubleshooting, repair, or replacement under
warranty.


Thank you for your time and support. I look forward to your assistance.

conversations.body_text: Hi B HIll,  For VAM motors, please make sure to use VAM mode only. Do not use VAM Pro mode, and avoid long-duration vibration telemetry effects such as RPM or engine speed. For the damaged motors, we will send you two replacement VAM motors. If the power connector feels loose, we recommend securing it with a cable tie to prevent movement and poor contact.

Hi,



Thank you for the clarification and for offering to send the two replacement VAM motors I appreciate the support.



Understood regarding usage going forward. I will ensure the replacements are used in VAM mode only, and I never used VAM Pro mode for any duration with the current motors.



I will also secure the power connector to prevent movement, as suggested.



Please let me know if you need any additional information from me (shipping address confirmation, order number, etc.) to proceed with sending the replacement motors.



Thanks again for your assistanc


Sent from my iPhone

>
